step.step1_click_register_button_on_top_bar: Click register button on top bar

step.expect1: Display error message account ID should contain numbers only
step.expect2: Display register button on the register page
step.expect3: Display login on nav link on the register page
step.expect4: User still on the register page

errorMsg.accountIdShouldContainNumbersOnly: Your account ID should contain numbers only.
